title: L.A. City Council District 13 voter guide: Mitch O'Farrell vs. Hugo Soto-Martinez
dc:creator: David Zahniser
description: Labor organizer Hugo Soto-Martinez is looking to unseat City Councilmember Mitch O'Farrell, who has spent nine years representing Hollywood and other areas.
content:encoded: Labor organizer Hugo Soto-Martinez is looking to unseat City Councilmember Mitch O'Farrell, who has spent nine years representing Hollywood and other areas.

media:content.media:description: L.A. City Council District 13 candidates Mitch O'Farrell, left, and Hugo Soto-Martinez.
